column4: QUESTION:  is there a way to boot into terminal from the LiveCD, cause i think there is actually an error with the user config for some reason on the PPC version
I am having issues with the root password not being recognized
no user password was set during configuration, just the option to create a regular account
and a root password, which seems not to work
is there a way to set my password right now for the user account w/o root access?
no, because when asked for the password:  if 'ubuntu' returns 'Sorry, Try again' else if '' brings me back to prompt, but <command> never executed
any ideas or directions i should take?
just verifying that this is the livecd
sorry - badly framed.  Are you using the Live CD?
yes, im using the liveCD PPC edition
i need to recover data from my MacMini
does "su -" work - with the root password
(I think you said you've set one)
thanks so much for pointing out the obvious to me, now i feel dumb
Hallelujah - seems I've finally helped someone today
